title: Research for Remote/Hybrid Employees
selftext:
Hello! I am a final-year design student working on my pre-thesis project which aims to delve into the intricate relationship between work-life balance and flexible work models, specifically work from home. It would greatly benefit my research if you could fill out this survey form. Please bhardijiyeü•∫‚ù§Ô∏è
